div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 587 Moigrad, 8 km. NE of Zalau, Ru- mania, 1907 Burial: 2nd-1st cent. B.C. (T) Contents: c. 1000 AR. Pot hoard Apollonia, Illyria: dr. Dyrrhachium: dr. Corcyra: dr. Disposition: Budapest part Gohl, Archaeologiai Értesítö 1900, p. 434; NK 1922-3, p. 7 Winkler, SCSCluj 1955, pp. 112, no. 29 and 120, no. 17
